[`Platform`](Platform)

## Platform variable

**Signature:**

```typescript
Platform: {
  isDesktop: boolean;
  isMobile: boolean;
  isDesktopApp: boolean;
  isMobileApp: boolean;
  isIosApp: boolean;
  isAndroidApp: boolean;
  isPhone: boolean;
  isTablet: boolean;
  isMacOS: boolean;
  isWin: boolean;
  isLinux: boolean;
  isSafari: boolean;
  resourcePathPrefix: string;
}
```
